title: DeskMate AI Tutoring Engine - Core Implementation
content:
# DeskMate AI Tutoring Engine

## Objectives
- Implement Socratic method questioning framework
- Develop subject-specific tutoring modules
- Create student interaction patterns
- Build progress tracking system

## Key Components
1. Question Generation System
2. Context Understanding Module
3. Learning Path Manager
4. Student Response Analyzer

## Success Criteria
- Successfully guides students through problem-solving using questions
- Adapts to student responses and learning pace
- Covers core subjects (Math, Science, Writing)
- Maintains engaging dialogue flow

## Timeline
- Week 1-2: Core dialogue system
- Week 3-4: Subject matter integration
- Week 5-6: Testing and refinement
